items.question: What is IPTV?
items.answer: IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) delivers TV content over the internet instead of cable or satellite. You can watch live TV, movies, and series on any device with an internet connection.

items.question: How do I pay?
items.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit card, PayPal, and bank transfer. Contact our support via WhatsApp to complete your order.

items.question: Which devices are supported?
items.answer: Our service works on Smart TVs, Android TV, Fire Stick, Android phones/tablets, iPhones, iPads, Windows, Mac, and many IPTV set-top boxes.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: We offer a 24-hour trial for new customers. Contact us via WhatsApp to get free access and test our service before subscribing.

items.question: How do I cancel?
items.answer: No long-term contract required. Your subscription will not auto-renew. Simply do not renew when your plan expires.
